name: Emily Moore
bio: Emily Moore is a graduate of Phillips Academy and Princeton University. Her poems have been published in The Best American Poetry blog, Ploughshares, the New Yorker, and the Paris Review, among others. She is a member of the “country camp trio” Ménage à Twang. The recipient of a Ruth Lilly Fellowship from Poetry, Moore teaches English at Stuyvesant High School in New York City.
